Texts.Chs: 这张优惠券的有效期似乎是你守护团毕业典礼前一周之内。
Texts.Eng: The expiry date for this coupon appears to be the week before your Protectorate graduation ceremony.

Texts.Chs: 这张优惠券赋予持有人 - 是的，就是你！改变生活的体验！享有改变人生的体验！来安东尼奥的平价披萨店吧，就在守护团学院附近，享受3个格兰德披萨的超值优惠，买二送半！别等了，今天就来吧!
Texts.Eng: This coupon entitles the holder - yes, you! - to a life-changing experience. Come on down to Antonio's Bargain Pizzeria, just a short walk from the Protectorate Academy, and enjoy the fabulous value of 3 grande pizzas for the price of two and a half! Don't wait, drop by today!
